product_name: Tiger Tail USA Massage-on-a-Rope Ball Massager
long_description: The Tiger Tail USA Massage-on-a-Rope Ball massager helps you work out knots, trigger points and sore muscles after intense workouts. Lean against a wall or lie on the ground to press the massage ball into your knots and sore muscles. 26 in. rope keeps the 2.6 in. massage surface close at hand so it doesn't roll away. Nonslip surface ensures controlled rolling. Easy to clean: simply use soap and water.
short_description: The Tiger Tail USA Massage-on-a-Rope Ball massager helps you work out knots, trigger points and sore muscles after intense workouts.
